mapper.insert: insert into t_apps(id, app_key, uid, name, pkg, create_time) values(#{id}, #{key}, #{uid}, #{name}, #{pkg}, now())
mapper.select: select * from t_apps where app_key=#{key} and uid=#{uid} and status=0
select id,app_key,uid,name,pkg,last_update_time,create_time from t_apps where uid=#{uid} and status=0 order by id asc;
select id,app_key,uid,name,pkg,last_update_time,create_time from t_apps where uid=#{uid} and status=0 order by id desc limit 0,5;
mapper.update: update t_apps set status=1 where app_key=#{key} and uid=#{uid}
